posts.post_content:
One of the most popular and fun cards in the set, and in my opinion, one of the best poses ever on a baseball card. A tough T210 to get out of the tougher Series 4. There is a crease that runs across the middle of the card. If you would like better pictures, just let me know!

[STRIKE]$500[/STRIKE] Sold delivered. Pm or email at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] with questions or offers. I would also be open to trades for T210's that I don't have, specifically Orange Borders.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=594125&d=1698081029[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=594126&d=1698081034[/IMG]

I always thought Benny looked like he was pretending to time travel to the 60s and to ride a Harley chopper with ape hangers.:D

Beautiful card best of luck trading or selling.
Just saw this card for the first time tonight - it expresses my feelings at the Rangers making the World Series quite nicely.
